title: Sona: the weakest in game
body: As someone who has played Sona constantly for a couple of years now, it is pretty obvious she has gone downhill. She basically has the lowest armor, magic resist, and movement speed in game. While her damage is fine almost everything else is not. Her heal/shield, movement speed ability, and ult are all pretty lackluster. While she does not need an extremely strong buff, when compared to other supports she is in desperate need of tweaking, but mainly in base stats. Also pretty much any champion can one shot her, so if you want to play Sona you have to be a god at dodging.

I think she just needs a rework.  She is an aura champion and Riot did away with the aura concept like 4 seasons ago because they were 'hidden power' or something.

Everything she does is lackluster and there's plenty of things they could change about her.

This, I agree that she needs a rework and I think the whole musician battle support theme has great potential for kit filled with artistic enrichment and complexity, but I think the playerbase of Sona players actually want her to remain braindead and annie-level simple.. which even makes it impossible to actually buff her without extreme levels of precaution

I can agree with that. I Mained her for a while and only really stopped because of shifting tastes in what I enjoyed and a little bit because I felt bad playing a 53% winrate champ (at the time). I’d like so see some buffs like Ult range increase, More movement speed on her rank 1 move speed ability, or minor ratio increases across the board. 

She’s really good, and she comes close to a late game Damage support as she is, so some ratio buffs or team fight utility like ult range could really help that. Lanning Sonna was really OP but maybe a late game oriented one will do better

She’s probably also not the weakest support in the game, just down there with some of them.
